name: Pokémon Gadir Deluxe
storyline: Embark on a new adventure in the Gadir Region, where you'll challenge gyms and ultimately face the Pokémon League. Explore the Gadir region on your own and discover all of its secrets while meeting a variety of different characters who will explain the history of Gadir.
summary: Pokémon Gadir Deluxe is a reimagining of the original Pokémon Gadir fan-made game. Embark on a new adventure in the Gadir Region, where you'll challenge gyms and ultimately face the Pokémon League.
